description.value:
The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod + 1 type=piercing average=true]] damage plus [[/damage 1d6 type=necrotic average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod + 1 type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The &Reference[dragon]{dragon} exhales shadowy &Reference[fire]{fire} in a 30-foot &Reference[cone]{cone}. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save dex 18 format=long]], taking [[/damage 16d6 type=necrotic average=true]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A &Reference[humanoid]{humanoid} reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies, and an &Reference[undead]{undead} shadow rises from its corpse and acts immediately after the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} in the initiative count. The shadow is under the dragon’s control.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

Living Shadow. While in dim light or darkness, the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} has resistance to damage that isn’t &Reference[force]{force}, &Reference[psychic]{psychic}, or &Reference[radiant]{radiant}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Shadow &Reference[ste]{Stealth}. While in dim light or darkness, the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, the &Reference[dragon]{dragon} has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on &Reference[wis]{Wisdom} (&Reference[prc]{Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
